name: Tapio
body:
## About
This is my open source coding portfolio. I develop mainly on Linux, but in a cross-platform way. My weapons include (in rough descending order of preference) C++, HTML5/CSS3/JS/WebGL, Bash, FreeBASIC, Python, C, PHP, Java.

## Projects I'm contributing to
I have not created these projects, but contributed quite much code to them.

* Stunt Rally - http://code.google.com/p/vdrift-ogre
* Performous - http://performous.org
  * Also, [Composer](http://performous.org/composer) - song creator for Performous

## Projects that have accepted my patches
Smaller scale contributions.

* Wendy - https://github.com/elmindreda/Wendy
* Coldest - http://www.coldestgame.com
* Liblub - https://github.com/lubosz/liblub
* OpenGL Rendering Kernel - http://ork.gforge.inria.fr

## My own projects

### Roguelikes
Small but complete games of the roguelike genre.

* 7DRL 2012: Infiniverse.js - http://roguebasin.roguelikedevelopment.org/index.php/Infiniverse
* 7DRL 2011: A Little Anxious When It's Dark - http://tapio.github.com/alawid
* 7DRL 2010: City of the Condemned - http://tapio.github.com/cotc
* 1kbrl - https://github.com/tapio/1kbrl

Also related:
  * [Unicodetiles.js](http://tapio.github.com/unicodetiles.js) - A JavaScript character based tile engine.

### Utilities and such
Miscellaneous little projects that are not games.

* [obj-magic](https://github.com/tapio/obj-magic) - A tool for manipulating Wavefront OBJ 3d meshes
* [tbcis](https://github.com/tapio/tbcis) - Tiny continuous integration system
* [nautilus-git-scripts](https://github.com/tapio/nautilus-git-scripts) - Interacting with Git repositories through Nautilus file manager

### Stalled
Interesting games that have not seen updates for some time, but I hope to pick up again in the future.

* Infiniverse - http://www.infiniverse-game.com
* Dawn of the Tomatoes - https://github.com/tapio/tomato

### Old or obsolete
These were done years ago and won't be developed further.

* Grid Space - https://github.com/tapio/grid-space
* Reaching for Stars! - https://github.com/tapio/reaching-for-stars
* Knight of Faith - https://github.com/tapio/koff
